login.title: A new step
login.description: To login to Bakey, you need to choose one of the following steps.
login.terms1: By singing up, you agree to out
login.terms3: . An email can't be used for login.

welcome.title: Set Username
welcome.description: Let's set your username. The username will be used to the URL of your profile page.
welcome.note: Your username will be visible to everyone. You will need to wait 30 days before making another change.
